sentences.en: A lorry blew a tyre and careered into them.
sentences.cn: 一辆货车爆胎了，向他们猛撞了过去。

sentences.en: A lorry driver can legally work eighty-two hours a week.
sentences.cn: 从法律上讲，货车司机一星期可工作82小时。

sentences.en: A lorry piled with scrap metal had shed its load.
sentences.cn: 一辆载满废金属的卡车掉货了。
一辆货车轰隆隆地驶过。

sentences.en: A lorry travelling south had a blow-out and crashed.
sentences.cn: 一辆南行的卡车爆胎并撞车了。

sentences.en: A seven-ton lorry slewed across their path.
sentences.cn: 一辆7吨的货车侧滑到了一侧。

sentences.en: Emergency food supplies were brought in by lorry .
sentences.cn: 应急食物是用卡车运来的。

sentences.en: He gets caviare that has fallen off the back of a lorry.
sentences.cn: 他能弄到来路不明的鱼子酱。

sentences.en: He looked straight ahead and overtook a lumbering lorry.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛直视前方，加速超过了前面一辆慢吞吞行进的大卡车。

sentences.en: Horrified commuters saw the lorry veer across the motorway and overturn.
sentences.cn: 惊恐万分的通勤者们看见那辆卡车突然冲向高速公路另一侧，接着翻倒在地。

sentences.en: Now and then they heard the roar of a heavy lorry.
sentences.cn: 他们不时听见一辆重型卡车的轰响声。

sentences.en: The lorry driver escaped unhurt, but a pedestrian was injured.
sentences.cn: 卡车司机安然脱险，但有一位行人受了伤。

sentences.en: The lorry was travelling at 20mph in the slow lane.
sentences.cn: 卡车在慢车道上以20英里的时速行驶。

sentences.en: Their car was in a head-on smash with an articulated lorry.
sentences.cn: 他们的轿车和一辆铰接式货车迎面相撞了。

sentences.en: They used a lorry to ram the main gate.
